long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add Atenear to your preferred web browser and forget about session expiration on Atenea (UPC, Universitat Politecnica de Catalunya).

Atenea is a propietary service from UPC built on top of Moodle. User sessions expire at approximately one hour of inactivity, which is annoying for anybody who uses Atenea in a daily basis. This extensions refreshes your Atenea session when it is about to expire.

Atenear does not use, nor have access to, your password.
